heading: Profile
description: Web Developer with experience building high quality responsive websites. Flexible in working environments, able to work on front-end development, back-end development and databases. Familiar with Agile Methodologies in software development lifecycle. Quick learner, adaptable and able to work in a team or as an individual

repeatable.title: Web Developer
repeatable.text: A startup that provides IT solutions to professionals and enterprises. I worked on the development, styling,  testing, and deployment of web applications to the cloud.
listItems: Build front-end using JavaScript, jQuery, Angularjs, and React JS
Create responsive user interfaces using HTML5, CSS3, and Bootstrap
Create back-end logic for websites and Web APIs in Laravel
Write SQL commands and stored procedures(Routines) in MySQL

repeatable.title: Web Developer Internship
repeatable.text: I worked on the designing and development of an ecommerce web application.
listItems: Build client side with HTML5, CSS3, and Bootstrap
Implement dynamic components using JavaScript and jQuery

repeatable.title: Mobile Solutions Development
repeatable.text: Solid understanding of software design concepts. Proficient with user interface design principles, computer and web application security, and usability testing

repeatable.title: Bachelor of Technology (Computer Science and Engineering)
repeatable.text: Immersed in four years of learning technical and programming concepts in the development of software systems, and implemented the knowledge to build enterprise level software and web applications

listItems: Front-end: Angularjs, React JS, jQuery, jQuery UI, and Bootstrap
Back-end: Laravel, ASP.Net, Java EE, and Node JS
Core programming languages: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, PHP, C#, Java, and SQL
IDE: Visual Studio 2015, SQL Server Management Studio, NetBeans, and Eclipse
